i love kids.

content.text: Hello! I'm interested in getting to know more about you.
Hi there! I'm a software engineer who loves dogs. I also like to write. What about you?
I'm a teacher who loves reading, writing, and spending time with my family.
Oh, that sounds fun! I also enjoy spending time with my family. What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in history and biographies.
I love history! My favorite musical is Hamilton, which is about the American Revolution.
That's a great musical! I've seen it twice.
My favorite season is winter. I love the snow and the cold weather.
I love winter too! I love skiing and snowboarding.
Me too! I love to go skiing with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! I'm glad you enjoy winter too.
Me too! It's my favorite season.
